burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.actorcritic

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.policy.Policy
      • burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.actorcritic.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoltzmannActor

    public abstract class Actor
extends Policy
    This class provides interface necessary for the actor portion of an Actor-Critic learning algorithm. Actors are almost entirely identical to policies since they effectively specify how the agent should act; in fact, this abstract class extends the Policy class. However, the extra important functionality that an actor must incorporate is the ability to adjust its policy in response to some critique of its behavior. In this class, this functionality should be implemented in the updateFromCritqique(CritiqueResult) method.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan
